*div1 type="summary"* *p*Trouble with De Leon.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-12-1826">12th Nov. [1826]*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*I am S[t]ill on the mend, and have the oppertunity of sendeing by *person_mentioned*Mr. John Brown*/person_mentioned* who has Just came from the *location_mentioned*Interior*/location_mentioned*—he seen the *person_mentioned*Colp*/person_mentioned* near *location_mentioned*Labahia*/location_mentioned* etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Madam Trudeau*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Mr. William Smith*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*Mr. Wightman*/person_mentioned* set off *date_mentioned n="11-11-1826">yesterday*/date_mentioned* for *location_mentioned*St. Antonio*/location_mentioned* and intended going by the way of *location_mentioned*Gonzales*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Mrs. T*/person_mentioned*— will give evidence to the *person_mentioned*Chief*/person_mentioned* relative to the Threats of *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned*, and they all three will urge the *person_mentioned*Chief*/person_mentioned* to order all the *person_mentioned*parties */person_mentioned*and papers before him: This is what we all wish for, and should Our friend *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* get there I fear no danger, but if he does not get on and the *person_mentioned*prisners*/person_mentioned* are detained in *location_mentioned*Labahia*/location_mentioned* etc. an *person_mentioned*Alcaldes Court*/person_mentioned* opened there for there trial the worst of consequences are to be feared.*/p*
*p*I am Conscious you need not be informed the nature of the *person_mentioned*Courts*/person_mentioned* they have at *location_mentioned*Delions Town*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Labahia*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*There is a kind of *person_mentioned*french Doctor*/person_mentioned* who came *person_mentioned*pasinger */person_mentioned*on the escambia and who it seems assumes the province of a *person_mentioned*Mexican officer*/person_mentioned*, and who has exercised greate pomp, dictatorial ship here—he sets up a Claim against *person_mentioned*powell*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*owner */person_mentioned*of the Cargo, for $9,000 and alledges Robery against the *person_mentioned*Capt.*/person_mentioned* of the vessel etc*/p*
*p*the *person_mentioned*commendant*/person_mentioned* has said that this said *person_mentioned*Doctor*/person_mentioned* is no *person_mentioned*Officer*/person_mentioned*,—*/p*
*p*It has been through this *person_mentioned*Doctor*/person_mentioned* that all this trouble has come on us this how[ev]er is my Opinion, and I am farther of the Opinion that the*person_mentioned* Sd. D.*/person_mentioned* is and has been acting under a bribe etc by some of our *person_mentioned*neighbours*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Burnett*/person_mentioned* is on the way and will be at the *location_mentioned*Guadaloupe*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-12-1826"> to night*/date_mentioned*, he was well *date_mentioned n="11-12-1826">this morning*/date_mentioned* at the *location_mentioned*Crossing of the La Baca*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*My Dear *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned* If there has been any threats Made by any of the *person_mentioned*Settlers*/person_mentioned* here I am yet Ignorant of them. I can not believe now that any other than, if wantonly, and Out rageously attacked by the *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned* or by *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned*, as he threatened they would defend themselves etc But no threat that has Came to my knowledge ever was made against the *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I am now fateagued and must close etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Please write me often—*/p*
*/div1*
